recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.method:
Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Stretch dough into a round base.
Spread tomato sauce and top with mozzarella and basil.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

recipes.title: BLT Sandwich
recipes.method:
Cook bacon until crisp and drain on paper towels.
Toast the bread slices.
Spread mayonnaise on toast, layer bacon, lettuce, and tomato.
Slice and serve.

recipes.title: Sushi Roll
recipes.method:
Cook and season sushi rice, then let it cool.
Place nori on a bamboo mat, spread rice evenly.
Add fillings (fish, avocado, cucumber) and roll tightly.
Slice the roll into pieces and serve with soy sauce.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.method:
Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing until evenly coated.
Add croutons and grated parmesan.
Serve immediately.
